qas.question: In what kind of folder are files located in the iPod?
On what kind of operating system can hidden iPod files be accessed?
What method of file recovery is used to retrieve data from the iPod?

context: Media files are stored on an iPod in a <a0_0>hidden<a0_0/> folder, along with a proprietary database file. The hidden content can be accessed on the <a1_0>host<a1_0/> operating system by enabling hidden files to be shown. The media files can then be recovered <a2_0>manual<a2_0/>ly by copying the files or folders off the iPod. Many third-party applications also allow easy copying of media files off of an iPod.
